pages.title: A Tinkerer's Vault
pages.text: $(o)Trading with the Villagers, you learn of a legendary mechanic known simply as 'The Tinkerer.' He were a brilliant inventor, who often sold his inventions to Villagers and Pillagers alike. He has gone missing, but it is rumored that he sealed away the notes on his inventions somewhere in a vault, never to be read again...$().
